definition: of the color of bronze, a sculpture made of bronze, to get a tan, from wind or sun
details:
adjective
- of the color of bronze
= example: of the color of bronze
= synonyms: bronzy
- made from or consisting of bronze
= example: made from or consisting of bronze
noun
- a sculpture made of bronze
= example: a sculpture made of bronze
- an alloy of copper and tin and sometimes other elements
= example: an alloy of copper and tin and sometimes other elements
verb
- to get a tan, from wind or sun
= example: to get a tan, from wind or sun
= synonyms: tan
- to give the color and appearance of bronze to something
= example: to give the color and appearance of bronze to something
